alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 1:47PM CST until March 04 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Big Nance Creek AT Courtland affecting Lawrence County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Nance Creek AT Courtland. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water begins to cover roads south of downtown Courtland. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:30 PM CST Friday was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest this afternoon and fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 4.4 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
